Our Linux Dedicated Servers offer unparalleled security, control, and management options. Featuring a highly available, redundant solution you can rest assured your business will always be available. Choose from any level of our Linux Dedicated Server Plans or contact us to get a solution that’s customized to your specifications!

WhitelabelITSolutions can provide you with custom servers and delivery solutions to meet your unique technical and business requirements. Choose from numerous Linux options, including: CentOS, Ubuntu, Debian, Cloudlinux and more.

Our expert Sales Professionals can work with you to build the custom solution that your business needs and our industry leading Support Professionals are available 24/7/365 for all of your support needs!

We have years of experience in providing Dedicated Server Web Hosting services that offer reliable Linux based dedicated server solutions. So, whether you want to run a large website or even a smaller exchange server, our dedicated servers are the perfect choice.

Our Low End Unix Dedicated servers below: 

--White Label Basic Server--
Intel Core i3-3220, Ivy Bridge 3.30 Ghz,  500 GB Hard Drive,   8 GB Upgradable Memory,   4 Dedicated Ip's/30 Subnet,   Unmetered Redundant Bandwidth, 100Mbps Port 

Package Starting at $39.99/mo 

--White Label Business Server--
Intel Core i5-3570, Ivy Bridge 3.4GHz,
500 GB Hard Drive,
8 GB Upgradable Memory,
4 Dedicated Ip's /30 Subnet,
Unmetered Redundant Bandwidth 100Mbps Port,

Package Starting at $74.99/mo

Available in all our plans:

Newest Linux Operating Systems available 
Options for  Plesk, Cpanel/WHM

No Bulk/Email Marketing Allowed

We have teamed up with the best of the best in order to provide you with industry leading features and technology. These strategic partnerships make Whitelabel ITSolutions competitive and you can rest easy that the solution you need will work to your specifications. And Many other Brand name trusted Companies!

We count with Direct peering to increases the speed and reliability of the exchange of communication. Whitelabel ITSolutions is taking out the middleman and providing clients with a direct connection to the top organizations in the market place. Routing to content and service providers allows the company to deliver low latency between clients and other service providers. Read more about it on whitelabelitsolutions.com/about-us/datacenter/
